title: Why is Odyssey listed under PvP?
body: When the description is clearly stated as PvE for Odyssey, and the hover text states co-op, why is it under the PvP tab instead of the Co-op vs AI?

replies.body: Even when we release PVE modes, we decide to keep them in the typical RGM slot so that players know exactly where to expect the active RGM :)
